text:
INDIANA UNIVERSITY
BLOOMINGTON, INDIANA
August 6, 1962
BUILDING
Miss Marion Corwell, Manager
Educational Television
Henry Ford Museum and
Greenfield Village
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Marion:
Me and my big mouth!
Put me down for the speech on "Teamwork in
Public Service Broadcasting." Two questions,
however, before I get into this. First, how
long should it be? Second, who is the assumed
audience for the speech?
V
I take it that I am not prohibited from making
a few complimentary remarks about the role of
the commercial station in public service
broadcasting if that sort ofpfits in.
Best regards.
N
er G. Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television
Communic ations
E)GS:drp
